Package com.cafean.client.ui.tools

Class InteractiveMouseHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cafean.client.ui.tools.MouseHandler
      • com.cafean.client.ui.tools.InteractiveMouseHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.util.EventListener
    public class InteractiveMouseHandler
extends MouseHandler
    A MouseHandler for interactive handling of events on the ZoomablePanel

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      InteractiveMouseHandler​(ZoomablePanel parent)
      Creates p new mouse handler with the given parent

      Sets up this MouseHandler to be ready to recieve MouseEvents

      returns the tooptip text to use for this MouseHandler's toggle button or null of no text is desired.

      • getButtonIcon

        public javax.swing.ImageIcon getButtonIcon()
        Returns the icon for use in creating an activation toolbar button for this handler. The returned icon need not be cached as this method will only be called once per instance.
        Overrides:
        getButtonIcon in class MouseHandler
        Returns:
        the javax.swing.ImageIcon to be used as this handler's toggle button icon.
